main.name: BlowVape
main.description: Welcome to BlowVape, your ultimate destination for high-quality vaping products and accessories. Explore our wide range of vape pens, e-liquids, and more.
main.bio: At BlowVape, we are passionate about providing the best vaping experience to our customers. From cutting-edge technology to premium flavors, we've got it all.
main.contactmessage: Have questions or want to learn more about our products? Feel free to reach out to us!

education.description: Immersive training in vape technology, e-liquid formulation, and customer service.
Studied the science behind vaping, safety protocols, and industry regulations.

work.title: Founder & CEO
work.description: Established BlowVape to provide enthusiasts with top-tier vaping products. Spearheaded product innovation and business growth.

work.title: Lead Vape Engineer
work.description: Designed and developed advanced vape devices, contributing to the evolution of vaping technology.
